title: 997 Joe Dispenza on 3 Secrets to Unlock the POWER of Your Mind
description:
“When you're no longer identifying with your body, your environment, and time, that’s the moment you’re pure consciousness.”

Lewis is joined by groundbreaking researcher Dr. Joe Dispenza to discuss how to align your brain and heart, stop being controlled by stress, and live in a state of happiness, gratitude, creativity, and love. The first step to owning your life is mastering your mind, and this episode gives you the tools you need.

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
